Detailed Description

The T9PackConnector provides functionality for accessing the data of a T9 pack.

Member Function Documentation

Returns the size of the LDB with the given id.

UINT8 *  dst,
INT  size
)  [static]
 

Reads size UINT8s beginning at offset and copies the data into dst.

Parameters:

dst UINT8 Array for copying the data.

Returns:

Sets the LDB identified by the parameter id active.

Returns:
